1. Find out more about the Victoria Sales Tax Development Corporation (VSTDC) that was created in 1996.
2. Find and View Public Notices for the City of Victoria.
3. #### [City Code](https://library.municode.com/tx/victoria/codes/code_of_ordinances)

   Visit the City Code website.
4. #### [City Council](https://www.victoriatx.gov/501/City-Council)

   Learn more about the City of Victoria City Council.
5. On May 3, 2025, Victoria voters approved the creation of a venue tax to help fund the renovation. Design work will take place in 2025.
6. #### [Annual Reports](https://www.victoriatx.gov/1328/Annual-Reports)

   Annual Reports for each department in the City of Victoria.
7. #### [Fiscal Year Annual Budget](https://www.victoriatx.gov/748/Fiscal-Year-Annual-Budget)
8. A master plan sets guidelines for how the City will expand and develop its services and may be specific to a department.
9. The City of Victoria is located at the center of the South Texas Crossroads and serves as the retail, medical, and higher education hub of the region.
10. A list of resources for employees of the City of Victoria, Texas
